statements: SELECT * FROM sculpture_resources;
SELECT resource_name, artist_name, era FROM sculpture_resources ORDER BY artist_name ASC;
SELECT artist_name, technique_used FROM sculpture_resources WHERE era='Renaissance';
SELECT * FROM sculpture_resources WHERE technique_used='Marble carving' AND era='Ancient';
SELECT artist_name, description FROM sculpture_resources WHERE artist_name='Michelangelo' OR artist_name='Leonardo da Vinci';
SELECT * FROM sculpture_resources WHERE era = 'Renaissance' ORDER BY artist_name DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT resource_name, artist_name, technique_used FROM sculpture_resources WHERE technique_used LIKE '%carving%' AND era = 'Baroque' ORDER BY artist_name ASC
SELECT resource_name, era FROM sculpture_resources WHERE description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY resource_name LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM sculpture_resources WHERE artist_name = 'Michelangelo' OR artist_name = 'Donatello' ORDER BY era DESC
SELECT artist_name, COUNT(*) AS total_resources FROM sculpture_resources GROUP BY artist_name HAVING total_resources > 1 ORDER BY total_resources DESC
SELECT * FROM SculptureTechniques;
SELECT technique_name, description FROM SculptureTechniques WHERE id = 1;
SELECT sculpture_title, artist_name, year_created FROM SculptureHistory ORDER BY year_created DESC;
SELECT artist_name, sculpture_title, materials_used FROM SculptureHistory WHERE materials_used LIKE '%marble%';
SELECT id, technique_name, description, DATE_FORMAT(created_at, '%Y-%m-%d') AS formatted_date FROM SculptureTechniques;
SELECT * FROM SculptureTechniques WHERE id = 1;
SELECT artist_name, sculpture_title, year_created FROM SculptureHistory WHERE year_created > 2000 ORDER BY year_created DESC;
SELECT technique_name, description FROM SculptureTechniques WHERE LENGTH(technique_name) > 10;
SELECT artist_name, sculpture_title, materials_used FROM SculptureHistory WHERE materials_used LIKE '%marble%';

SELECT technique_name, COUNT(*) AS num_sculptures FROM SculptureTechniques JOIN SculptureHistory ON SculptureTechniques.id = SculptureHistory.technique_id GROUP BY technique_name ORDER BY num_sculptures DESC;
SELECT * FROM sculpture_techniques;
SELECT technique_name, description FROM sculpture_techniques;
SELECT technique_id, technique_name FROM sculpture_techniques ORDER BY technique_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM sculpture_history WHERE artist_name='Leonardo Da Vinci';
SELECT description, artist_name FROM sculpture_history WHERE year_created BETWEEN 1500 AND 1600;
SELECT * FROM sculpture_techniques WHERE technique_name = 'Carving' ORDER BY technique_id DESC;
SELECT artist_name, year_created FROM sculpture_history WHERE year_created > 2000 ORDER BY year_created ASC;
SELECT technique_name, description FROM sculpture_techniques WHERE description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY technique_name;
SELECT * FROM learning_resources WHERE resource_type = 'Video' AND link LIKE '%tutorials%';
SELECT artist_name, year_created, description FROM sculpture_history WHERE artist_name LIKE '%John%' OR artist_name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT * FROM SculptureTechniques;
SELECT technique_name FROM SculptureTechniques WHERE technique_id = 1;
SELECT history_event, history_year FROM SculptureHistory ORDER BY history_year DESC;
SELECT * FROM SculptureResources WHERE resource_name LIKE '%sculpture%';
SELECT curation_name, curation_description FROM SculptureCurations ORDER BY curation_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM SculptureTechniques WHERE technique_id > 5;
SELECT technique_name FROM SculptureTechniques WHERE technique_name LIKE '%marble%';
SELECT history_year, history_event FROM SculptureHistory WHERE history_year BETWEEN 1800 AND 1900;
SELECT * FROM SculptureTechniques ORDER BY technique_name DESC;
SELECT curation_name, curation_description FROM SculptureCurations WHERE curation_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM sculptures;
SELECT id, name, artist FROM sculptures WHERE artist = 'Michelangelo';
SELECT name, creation_year FROM sculptures WHERE material = 'Marble' ORDER BY creation_year DESC;
SELECT artist, COUNT(*) AS total_sculptures FROM sculptures GROUP BY artist HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM sculptures WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM sculptures ORDER BY name DESC, creation_year ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT name, artist, material FROM sculptures WHERE creation_year >= 1900 AND creation_year <= 1950 ORDER BY creation_year DESC;

SELECT sculptures.name, artists.name AS artist_name, sculptures.material, artists.nationality FROM sculptures INNER JOIN artists ON sculptures.artist = artists.id WHERE sculptures.material = 'Marble' ORDER BY sculptures.name ASC;

SELECT sculptures.name AS sculpture_name, sculpture_categories.category_name AS category FROM sculptures INNER JOIN sculpture_categories ON sculptures.id = sculpture_categories.id WHERE sculptures.creation_year IS NULL;

SELECT sculptures.name, learning_resources.title, learning_resources.resource_type FROM sculptures INNER JOIN resource_mappings ON sculptures.id = resource_mappings.sculpture_id INNER JOIN learning_resources ON resource_mappings.resource_id = learning_resources.id WHERE sculptures.material = 'Bronze';
